verses.text_uthmani: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا

translations.text: Blessed is the One Who sent down the Decisive Authority<sup foot_note=77060>1</sup> to His servant,<sup foot_note=77061>2</sup> so that he may be a warner to the whole world.<sup foot_note=77062>3</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tabaraka allathee nazzalaalfurqana AAala AAabdihi liyakoona lilAAalameenanatheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٌ فِى ٱلْمُلْكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقْدِيرًا

translations.text: ˹Allah is˺ the One to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, Who has never had ˹any˺ offspring, nor does He have a partner in ˹governing˺ the kingdom. He has created everything, ordaining it precisely.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee lahu mulku assamawatiwal-ardi walam yattakhith waladan walamyakun lahu shareekun fee almulki wakhalaqa kulla shay-infaqaddarahu taqdeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً لَّا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ مَوْتًا وَلَا حَيَوٰةً وَلَا نُشُورًا

translations.text: Yet they have taken besides Him gods who cannot create anything but are themselves created. Nor can they protect or benefit themselves. Nor can they control life, death, or resurrection.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wattakhathoo min doonihi alihatanla yakhluqoona shay-an wahum yukhlaqoona walayamlikoona li-anfusihim darran wala nafAAan walayamlikoona mawtan wala hayatan walanushoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ قَوْمٌ ءَاخَرُونَ ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءُو ظُلْمًا وَزُورًا

translations.text: The disbelievers say, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but a fabrication which he<sup foot_note=77063>1</sup> made up with the help of others.” Their claim is totally unjustified and untrue!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala allatheena kafaroo in hathailla ifkun iftarahu waaAAanahu AAalayhiqawmun akharoona faqad jaoo thulmanwazoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ٱكْتَتَبَهَا فَهِىَ تُمْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا

translations.text: And they say, “˹These revelations are only˺ ancient fables which he has had written down, and they are rehearsed to him morning and evening.”<sup foot_note=77064>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo asateeru al-awwaleenaiktatabaha fahiya tumla AAalayhi bukratan waaseela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِى يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “This ˹Quran˺ has been revealed by the One Who knows the secrets of the heavens and the earth. Surely He is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.”<sup foot_note=77065>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul anzalahu allathee yaAAlamu assirrafee assamawati wal-ardiinnahu kana ghafooran raheema
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِى فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۙ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا

translations.text: And they say ˹mockingly˺, “What kind of messenger is this who eats food and goes about in market-places ˹for a living˺? If only an angel had been sent down with him to be his co-warner,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo mali hatha arrasooliya/kulu attaAAama wayamshee fee al-aswaqilawla onzila ilayhi malakun fayakoona maAAahu natheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوْ يُلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٌ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهَا ۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلًا مَّسْحُورًا

translations.text: or a treasure had been cast down to him, or he had had a garden from which he may eat!” And the wrongdoers say ˹to the believers˺, “You are only following a bewitched man.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aw yulqa ilayhi kanzun aw takoonu lahujannatun ya/kulu minha waqala aththalimoonain tattabiAAoona illa rajulan mashoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ فَضَلُّوا۟ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلًا

translations.text: See ˹O Prophet˺ how they call you names!<sup foot_note=77066>1</sup> So they have gone so ˹far˺ astray that they cannot find the ˹Right˺ Way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Onthur kayfa daraboolaka al-amthala fadalloo fala yastateeAAoonasabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيْرًا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ وَيَجْعَل لَّكَ قُصُورًۢا

translations.text: Blessed is the One Who—if He wills—can give you far better than ˹all˺ that: gardens under which rivers flow, and palaces as well.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tabaraka allathee in shaajaAAala laka khayran min thalika jannatin tajreemin tahtiha al-anharu wayajAAal laka qusoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا

translations.text: In fact, they deny the Hour.<sup foot_note=77067>1</sup> And for the deniers of the Hour, We have prepared a blazing Fire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal kaththaboo bissaAAatiwaaAAtadna liman kaththaba bissaAAatisaAAeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذَا رَأَتْهُم مِّن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا تَغَيُّظًا وَزَفِيرًا

translations.text: Once it sees them from a distance, they will hear it fuming and growling.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Itha raat-hum min makaninbaAAeedin samiAAoo laha taghayyuthanwazafeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مَكَانًا ضَيِّقًا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوْا۟ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًا

translations.text: And when they are tossed into a narrow place inside ˹Hell˺, chained together, then and there they will cry out for ˹instant˺ destruction.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha olqoo minha makanandayyiqan muqarraneena daAAaw hunalika thuboora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا تَدْعُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًا وَٰحِدًا وَٱدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا كَثِيرًا

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Do not cry only once for destruction Today, but cry many times over!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La tadAAoo alyawma thubooran wahidanwadAAoo thubooran katheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ ٱلْخُلْدِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۚ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَزَآءً وَمَصِيرًا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Is this better or the Garden of Eternity which the righteous have been promised, as a reward and ˹an ultimate˺ destination?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul athalika khayrun am jannatualkhuldi allatee wuAAida almuttaqoona kanat lahum jazaanwamaseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَـٰلِدِينَ ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعْدًا مَّسْـُٔولًا

translations.text: There they will have whatever they wish for, forever. That is a promise ˹to be sought after˺, binding on your Lord.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lahum feeha ma yashaoonakhalideena kana AAala rabbika waAAdanmas-oola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمْ أَضْلَلْتُمْ عِبَادِى هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمْ هُمْ ضَلُّوا۟ ٱلسَّبِيلَ

translations.text: ˹Watch for˺ the Day He will gather them along with what they used to worship besides Allah, and ask ˹the objects of worship˺,<sup foot_note=77068>1</sup> “Was it you who misled these servants of Mine, or did they stray from the Way ˹on their own˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayawma yahshuruhum wamayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi fayaqoolu aantum adlaltumAAibadee haola-i am hum dalloo assabeel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِى لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ وَلَـٰكِن مَّتَّعْتَهُمْ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَسُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بُورًا

translations.text: They will say, “Glory be to You! It was not right for ˹others like˺ us to take any lords besides You,<sup foot_note=77069>1</sup> but You allowed enjoyment for them and their forefathers ˹for so long˺ that they forgot ˹Your˺ remembrance and became a doomed people.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo subhanaka ma kanayanbaghee lana an nattakhitha min doonika min awliyaawalakin mattaAAtahum waabaahum hattanasoo aththikra wakanoo qawman boora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسْتَطِيعُونَ صَرْفًا وَلَا نَصْرًا ۚ وَمَن يَظْلِم مِّنكُمْ نُذِقْهُ عَذَابًا كَبِيرًا

translations.text: ˹The doomed will be told˺, “Your gods have clearly denied your claims. So now you can neither ward off ˹the punishment˺ nor get any help.” And whoever of you does wrong, We will make them taste a horrible punishment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqad kaththabookum bimataqooloona fama tastateeAAoona sarfan walanasran waman yathlim minkum nuthiqhuAAathaban kabeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ لَيَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشُونَ فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۗ وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًا

translations.text: We never sent any messenger before you ˹O Prophet˺, who did not eat food and go about in market-places. We have made some of you a trial for others. Will you ˹not then˺ be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama arsalna qablaka minaalmursaleena illa innahum laya/kuloona attaAAamawayamshoona fee al-aswaqi wajaAAalna baAAdakumlibaAAdin fitnatan atasbiroona wakanarabbuka baseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَا ۗ لَقَدِ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَعَتَوْ عُتُوًّا كَبِيرًا

translations.text: Those who do not expect to meet Us say, “If only the angels were sent down to us, or we could see our Lord!” They have certainly been carried away by their arrogance and have entirely exceeded all limits.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala allatheena layarjoona liqaana lawla onzila AAalaynaalmala-ikatu aw nara rabbana laqadiistakbaroo fee anfusihim waAAataw AAutuwwan kabeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشْرَىٰ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا

translations.text: ˹But˺ on the Day they will see the angels, there will be no good news for the wicked, who will cry, “Keep away! Away ˹from us˺!”<sup foot_note=77070>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma yarawna almala-ikata labushra yawma-ithin lilmujrimeena wayaqooloona hijranmahjoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَدِمْنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ مِنْ عَمَلٍ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ هَبَآءً مَّنثُورًا

translations.text: Then We will turn to whatever ˹good˺ deeds they did, reducing them to scattered dust.<sup foot_note=77071>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqadimna ila maAAamiloo min AAamalin fajaAAalnahu habaan manthoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَيْرٌ مُّسْتَقَرًّا وَأَحْسَنُ مَقِيلًا

translations.text: ˹But˺ on that Day the residents of Paradise will have the best settlement and the finest place to rest.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: As-habu aljannati yawma-ithinkhayrun mustaqarran waahsanu maqeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلْغَمَـٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا

translations.text: ˹Watch for˺ the Day the heavens will burst with clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive ranks.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayawma tashaqqaqu assamao bilghamamiwanuzzila almala-ikatu tanzeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْحَقُّ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ وَكَانَ يَوْمًا عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرًا

translations.text: True authority on that Day will belong ˹only˺ to the Most Compassionate.<sup foot_note=77072>1</sup> And it will be a hard day for the disbelievers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Almulku yawma-ithin alhaqqu lirrahmaniwakana yawman AAala alkafireena AAaseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَوْمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيْهِ يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى ٱتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلًا

translations.text: And ˹beware of˺ the Day the wrongdoer will bite his nails ˹in regret˺ and say, “Oh! I wish I had followed the Way along with the Messenger!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayawma yaAAaddu aththalimuAAala yadayhi yaqoolu ya laytanee ittakhathtumaAAa arrasooli sabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰوَيْلَتَىٰ لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًا

translations.text: Woe to me! I wish I had never taken so-and-so as a close friend.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya waylata laytanee lamattakhith fulanan khaleela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ ٱلذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَنِى ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ خَذُولًا

translations.text: It was he who truly made me stray from the Reminder after it had reached me.” And Satan has always betrayed humanity.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad adallanee AAani aththikribaAAda ith jaanee wakana ashshaytanulil-insani khathoola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَـٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًا

translations.text: The Messenger has cried, “O my Lord! My people have indeed received this Quran with neglect.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala arrasoolu yarabbi inna qawmee ittakhathoo hatha alqur-anamahjoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّا مِّنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيًا وَنَصِيرًا

translations.text: Similarly, We made enemies for every prophet from among the wicked, but sufficient is your Lord as a Guide and Helper.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakathalika jaAAalna likullinabiyyin AAaduwwan mina almujrimeena wakafa birabbika hadiyanwanaseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ جُمْلَةً وَٰحِدَةً ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۖ وَرَتَّلْنَـٰهُ تَرْتِيلًا

translations.text: The disbelievers say, “If only the Quran had been sent down to him all at once!” ˹We have sent it˺ as such ˹in stages˺ so We may reassure your heart with it. And We have revealed it at a deliberate pace.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala allatheena kafaroo lawlanuzzila AAalayhi alqur-anu jumlatan wahidatan kathalikalinuthabbita bihi fu-adaka warattalnahu tarteela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا يَأْتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَحْسَنَ تَفْسِيرًا

translations.text: Whenever they bring you an argument, We come to you with the right refutation and the best explanation.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala ya/toonaka bimathalin illaji/naka bilhaqqi waahsana tafseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا

translations.text: Those who will be dragged into Hell on their faces will be in the worst place, and are ˹now˺ farthest from the ˹Right˺ Way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena yuhsharoona AAalawujoohihim ila jahannama ola-ika sharrun makananwaadallu sabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ وَزِيرًا

translations.text: We certainly gave Moses the Book and appointed his brother Aaron as his helper.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad atayna moosaalkitaba wajaAAalna maAAahu akhahu haroonawazeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقُلْنَا ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ تَدْمِيرًا

translations.text: We had ordered ˹them˺, “Go to the people who would deny Our signs.” Then We annihilated the deniers entirely.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqulna ithhaba ilaalqawmi allatheena kaththaboo bi-ayatinafadammarnahum tadmeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُوا۟ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةً ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

translations.text: And when the people of Noah rejected the messengers,<sup foot_note=77073>1</sup> We drowned them, making them an example to humanity. And We have prepared a painful punishment for the wrongdoers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqawma noohin lamma kaththabooarrusula aghraqnahum wajaAAalnahum linnasiayatan waaAAtadna liththalimeenaAAathaban aleema
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَعَادًا وَثَمُودَا۟ وَأَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًۢا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًا

translations.text: Also ˹We destroyed˺ ’Ȃd, Thamûd, and the people of the Water-pit,<sup foot_note=77074>1</sup> as well as many peoples in between.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAadan wathamooda waas-habaarrassi waquroonan bayna thalika katheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكُلًّا ضَرَبْنَا لَهُ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ ۖ وَكُلًّا تَبَّرْنَا تَتْبِيرًا

translations.text: For each We set forth ˹various˺ lessons, and We ultimately destroyed each.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakullan darabna lahu al-amthalawakullan tabbarna tatbeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَى ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُمْطِرَتْ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ أَفَلَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَرَوْنَهَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ نُشُورًا

translations.text: They have certainly passed by the city ˹of Sodom˺, which had been showered with a dreadful rain ˹of stones˺. Have they not seen its ruins? But they do not expect to be resurrected.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad ataw AAala alqaryati allateeomtirat matara assaw-i afalam yakoonooyarawnaha bal kanoo la yarjoona nushoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا

translations.text: When they see you ˹O Prophet˺, they only make fun of you, ˹saying,˺ “Is this the one that Allah has sent as a messenger?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha raawka in yattakhithoonakailla huzuwan ahatha allathee baAAatha Allahurasoola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوْلَآ أَن صَبَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْعَذَابَ مَنْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا

translations.text: He would have almost tricked us away from our gods, had we not been so devoted to them.” ˹But˺ soon they will know, when they face the punishment, who is far astray from the ˹Right˺ Way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In kada layudillunaAAan alihatina lawla an sabarnaAAalayha wasawfa yaAAlamoona heena yarawna alAAathabaman adallu sabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَـٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ وَكِيلًا

translations.text: Have you seen ˹O Prophet˺ the one who has taken their own desires as their god? Will you then be a keeper over them?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Araayta mani ittakhatha ilahahuhawahu afaanta takoonu AAalayhi wakeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۖ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا

translations.text: Or do you think that most of them listen or understand?<sup foot_note=77075>1</sup> They are only like cattle—no, more than that, they are astray from the ˹Right˺ Way!<sup foot_note=77076>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am tahsabu anna aktharahumyasmaAAoona aw yaAAqiloona in hum illa kal-anAAamibal hum adallu sabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنًا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًا

translations.text: Have you not seen how your Lord extends the shade—He could have simply made it ˹remain˺ still if He so willed—then We make the sun its guide,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda aththillawalaw shaa lajaAAalahu sakinan thumma jaAAalnaashshamsa AAalayhi daleela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ قَبَضْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْنَا قَبْضًا يَسِيرًا

translations.text: causing the shade to retreat gradually?<sup foot_note=77077>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma qabadnahu ilaynaqabdan yaseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًا

translations.text: He is the One Who has made the night for you as a cover, and ˹made˺ sleep for resting, and the day for rising.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala lakumuallayla libasan wannawma subatan wajaAAalaannahara nushoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً طَهُورًا

translations.text: And He is the One Who sends the winds ushering in His mercy, and We send down pure rain from the sky,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee arsala arriyahabushran bayna yaday rahmatihi waanzalna mina assama-imaan tahoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِّنُحْـِۧىَ بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا وَأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًا

translations.text: giving life to a lifeless land, and providing water for countless animals and humans of Our Own creation.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Linuhyiya bihi baldatan maytanwanusqiyahu mimma khalaqna anAAaman waanasiyyakatheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَـٰهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًا

translations.text: We certainly disperse it among them so they may be mindful, but most people persist in ungratefulness.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad sarrafnahu baynahumliyaththakkaroo faaba aktharu annasiilla kufoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ نَّذِيرًا

translations.text: Had We willed, We could have easily sent a warner to every society.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw shi/na labaAAathna feekulli qaryatin natheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَجَـٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًا كَبِيرًا

translations.text: So do not yield to the disbelievers, but strive diligently against them with this ˹Quran˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala tutiAAi alkafireenawajahidhum bihi jihadan kabeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًا وَحِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا

translations.text: And He is the One Who merges the two bodies of water: one fresh and palatable and the other salty and bitter, placing between them a barrier they cannot cross.<sup foot_note=77078>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee maraja albahraynihatha AAathbun furatun wahatha milhunojajun wajaAAala baynahuma barzakhan wahijranmahjoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًا وَصِهْرًا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا

translations.text: And He is the One Who creates human beings from a ˹humble˺ liquid,<sup foot_note=77079>1</sup> then establishes for them bonds of kinship and marriage. For your Lord is Most Capable.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa mina alma-ibasharan fajaAAalahu nasaban wasihran wakanarabbuka qadeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرًا

translations.text: Yet they worship besides Allah what can neither benefit nor harm them. And the disbeliever always collaborates against their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi mala yanfaAAuhum wala yadurruhum wakanaalkafiru AAala rabbihi thaheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا

translations.text: And We have sent you ˹O Prophet˺ only as a deliverer of good news and a warner.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama arsalnaka illamubashshiran wanatheera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

translations.text: Say, “I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺, but whoever wishes, let them pursue the Way to their Lord.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul ma as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrinilla man shaa an yattakhitha ilarabbihi sabeela
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْحَىِّ ٱلَّذِى لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا

translations.text: Put your trust in the Ever-Living, Who never dies, and glorify His praises. Sufficient is He as All-Aware of the sins of His servants.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watawakkal AAala alhayyi allatheela yamootu wasabbih bihamdihi wakafabihi bithunoobi AAibadihi khabeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَسْـَٔلْ بِهِۦ خَبِيرًا

translations.text: ˹He is˺ the One Who created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days,<sup foot_note=77080>1</sup> then established Himself on the Throne. ˹He is˺ the Most Compassionate! Ask ˹none other than˺ the All-Knowledgeable about Himself.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma fee sittatiayyamin thumma istawa AAala alAAarshi arrahmanufas-al bihi khabeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ أَنَسْجُدُ لِمَا تَأْمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمْ نُفُورًا ۩

translations.text: When it is said to them, “Prostrate to the Most Compassionate,” they ask ˹in disgust˺, “What is ‘the Most Compassionate’? Will we prostrate to whatever you order us to?” And it only drives them farther away.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha qeela lahumu osjudoo lirrahmaniqaloo wama arrahmanu anasjudulima ta/muruna wazadahum nufoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًا وَقَمَرًا مُّنِيرًا

translations.text: Blessed is the One Who has placed constellations in the sky, as well as a ˹radiant˺ lamp<sup foot_note=77081>1</sup> and a luminous moon.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tabaraka allathee jaAAala feeassama-i buroojan wajaAAala feeha sirajanwaqamaran muneera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةً لِّمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوْ أَرَادَ شُكُورًا

translations.text: And He is the One Who causes the day and the night to alternate, ˹as a sign˺ for whoever desires to be mindful or to be grateful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala allayla wannaharakhilfatan liman arada an yaththakkara aw aradashukoora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ قَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا

translations.text: The ˹true˺ servants of the Most Compassionate are those who walk on the earth humbly, and when the foolish address them ˹improperly˺, they only respond with peace.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAibadu arrahmaniallatheena yamshoona AAala al-ardi hawnanwa-itha khatabahumu aljahiloona qaloosalama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمْ سُجَّدًا وَقِيَـٰمًا

translations.text: ˹They are˺ those who spend ˹a good portion of˺ the night, prostrating themselves and standing before their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena yabeetoonalirabbihim sujjadan waqiyama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا

translations.text: ˹They are˺ those who pray, “Our Lord! Keep the punishment of Hell away from us, for its punishment is indeed unrelenting.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena yaqooloona rabbanaisrif AAanna AAathaba jahannama inna AAathabahakana gharama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا

translations.text: It is certainly an evil place to settle and reside.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innaha saat mustaqarran wamuqama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا۟ وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًا

translations.text: ˹They are˺ those who spend neither wastefully nor stingily, but moderately in between.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena ithaanfaqoo lam yusrifoo walam yaqturoo wakana bayna thalikaqawama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفْسَ ٱلَّتِى حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًا

translations.text: ˹They are˺ those who do not invoke any other god besides Allah, nor take a ˹human˺ life—made sacred by Allah—except with ˹legal˺ right,<sup foot_note=77082>1</sup> nor commit fornication. And whoever does ˹any of˺ this will face the penalty.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena layadAAoona maAAa Allahi ilahan akharawala yaqtuloona annafsa allatee harrama Allahuilla bilhaqqi wala yaznoona wamanyafAAal thalika yalqa athama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُضَـٰعَفْ لَهُ ٱلْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا

translations.text: Their punishment will be multiplied on the Day of Judgment, and they will remain in it forever, in disgrace.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: YudaAAaf lahu alAAathabu yawmaalqiyamati wayakhlud feehi muhana
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ حَسَنَـٰتٍ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا

translations.text: As for those who repent, believe, and do good deeds, they are the ones whose evil deeds Allah will change into good deeds. For Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa man taba waamanawaAAamila AAamalan salihan faola-ikayubaddilu Allahu sayyi-atihim hasanatinwakana Allahu ghafooran raheema
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابًا

translations.text: And whoever repents and does good has truly turned to Allah properly.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman taba waAAamila salihanfa-innahu yatoobu ila Allahi mataba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِٱللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا۟ كِرَامًا

translations.text: ˹They are˺ those who do not bear false witness, and when they come across falsehood, they pass ˹it˺ by with dignity.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena layashhadoona azzoora wa-itha marroo billaghwimarroo kirama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا۟ عَلَيْهَا صُمًّا وَعُمْيَانًا

translations.text: ˹They are˺ those who, when reminded of the revelation of their Lord, do not turn a blind eye or a deaf ear to it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena itha thukkiroobi-ayati rabbihim lam yakhirroo AAalayha summanwaAAumyana
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَٱجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا

translations.text: ˹They are˺ those who pray, “Our Lord! Bless us with ˹pious˺ spouses and offspring who will be the joy of our hearts, and make us models for the righteous.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena yaqooloona rabbanahab lana min azwajina wathurriyyatinaqurrata aAAyunin wajAAalna lilmuttaqeena imama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةً وَسَلَـٰمًا

translations.text: It is they who will be rewarded with ˹elevated˺ mansions ˹in Paradise˺ for their perseverance, and will be received with salutations and ˹greetings of˺ peace,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika yujzawna alghurfata bimasabaroo wayulaqqawna feeha tahiyyatan wasalama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا

translations.text: staying there forever. What an excellent place to settle and reside!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khalideena feeha hasunatmustaqarran wamuqama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا۟ بِكُمْ رَبِّى لَوْلَا دُعَآؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًۢا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You ˹all˺ would not ˹even˺ matter to my Lord were it not for your faith ˹in Him˺. But now you ˹disbelievers˺ have denied ˹the truth˺, so the torment is bound to come.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul ma yaAAbao bikum rabbee lawladuAAaokum faqad kaththabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizama
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
